caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 43.
Quadrimaera serrata (Schellenberg, 1938)
male 9 mm, AM P.92512; *male 6.0 mm, AM P.92514; b female 6.4 mm, AM P.92513, Fig Valley Reef, Norfolk Island, South Pacific, scales 0.1 mm.
